bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR SALE OF DOMAIN NAMES

nplcit.text: Portsmouth, I. (2001, 10). Domain-name games [it's a jungle out there]. Profit, 20, 85. Retrieved from http://search.proquest.com/docview/219312441?accountid=14753 [recovered from ProQuest 6/12/2014]

Pro domain registry slashes prices for professionals: 75% discount for lawyers, engineers, doctors and accountants. (2006, Feb 08). PR Newswire Retrieved from http://search.proquest.com/docview/451257855?accountid=14753 [recovered from ProQuest 6/12/2014]

abstract.p: A method of determining a multi-year renewal price for an expiring domain name includes setting a first selling price for the expiring domain name and determining that a first period of time has elapsed. The method also includes setting a second selling price for the expiring domain name. The second selling price is less than the first selling price. The method further includes determining the multi-year renewal price. A price for a first year is equal to the second selling price and a price for a second year is greater than the second selling price and less than or equal to the first selling price.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR SALE OF DOMAIN NAMES
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE VENTE DE NOMS DE DOMAINE

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR SALE OF DOMAIN NAMES
VERFAHREN UND SYSTEM ZUM VERKAUF VON DOMÄNENNAMEN
PROCÉDÉ ET SYSTÈME DE VENTE DE NOMS DE DOMAINE
METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR SALE OF DOMAIN NAMES
METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR SALE OF DOMAIN NAMES
PROCÉDÉ ET SYSTÈME DE VENTE DE NOMS DE DOMAINE

abstract.p: A method of determining a multi-year renewal price for an expiring domain name includes setting a first selling price for the expiring domain name and determining that a first period of time has elapsed. The method also includes setting a second selling price for the expiring domain name. The second selling price is less than the first selling price. The method further includes determining the multi-year renewal price. A price for a first year is equal to the second selling price and a price for a second year is greater than the second selling price and less than or equal to the first selling price.

Un procédé de détermination d'un prix de renouvellement multi-annuel d'un nom de domaine en voie d'expiration consiste à fixer un premier prix de vente pour le nom de domaine en voie d'expiration et à déterminer qu'une première période de temps s'est écoulée. Le procédé consiste également à fixer un second prix de vente pour le nom de domaine en voie d'expiration. Le second prix de vente est inférieur au premier prix de vente. Le procédé consiste en outre à déterminer le prix de renouvellement multi-annuel. Un prix pour une première année est égal au second prix de vente et un prix pour une seconde année est supérieur au second prix de vente et inférieur ou égal au premier prix de vente.
